Description: Virgin and Child with Sts Anne, John the Baptist, Zeno and Antony, after Balestra, with at centre Christ standing in his cradle, leaning on the seated virgin whilst looking at St Anne, who kneels before him; St John the Baptist kneels in the left foreground; St Zeno and Antony stand in the background, to the right. 1739 Etching and engraving
Curator's comments: Painting executed for the church of Sant'Anna d'Alfadeo, Verona; see Polazzo, 'Antonio Balestra', Verona, 1978, cat. No.64.
Associated names: Representation of: St John the Baptist (Prodromos)
Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
